subtitle: Serve with a herby, colourful salad.

method.text: Cover turkey with cling film. Use end of a rolling pin to gently beat until it is 1 cm thick all over.
Brush griddle pan with a little oil, then heat until it is really hot. Add turkey and cook for 8-10 min turning once until charred on both sides. Set aside.
Brush griddle pan with a little oil, then heat until it is really hot. Add apple slices and cook for 2-3 min turning once until charred on both sides. Set aside.
Meanwhile cook beans in a pan of boiling water for 3-4 min or until just tender. Drain, rinse in cold water and drain.
Tear lettuce into pieces and place in salad bowl. Add tomatoes, beans, onion and half the coriander leaves.
To make dressing: Finely chop remaining coriander and mix with remaining oil, lime rind and juice and honey. Season to taste.
Add turkey and apples to salad and toss, adding the dressing.

title: Chargrilled turkey and apple salad
